summary: Provides a base test harness that prepares a single distributed data‑parallel (DDP) environment and a shared pool of worker processes, then offers utilities to execute a large number of parameterized metric tests efficiently. Sub‑classes define specific metric test methods that invoke the provided execution helpers.
business_intent: Enable rapid, scalable validation of metric implementations across multiple processes without repeatedly initializing DDP, thereby reducing test runtime and resource overhead in large‑scale machine‑learning pipelines.
